title: Stress management: wedding daze
creator_credit: A. Scott Miller, Robert Boucher and Paramount Communications
brief_description: Follows the members of a wedding party on the day of the wedding and shows their various reactions to the stresses under which they are placed. Points out that negative reactions to stress can be avoided and suggests how to accomplish this. Suitable for upper secondary and teacher/tertiary levels.
